mapper.insert: insert into B_BLACKLIST_T (id, validflag, Cardid, Recordtype, Createman, createdate, Usermemo) values (B_BLACKLIST_s.Nextval, 1, #{cardid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recordtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate, #{usermemo,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select b.carno, b.validflag, b.cardclass recordtype, b.driver, b.deposit, b.motorcadecode, b.motorcadename, b.begintime, b.endtime, decode(b.beginperiod, '', '', to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-MM-dd ') || b.beginperiod) beginperiod, decode(b.endperiod, '', '', to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-MM-dd ') || b.endperiod) endperiod, b.cartype from B_CARD_T b where b.cardid=#{cardid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select b.carno, b.cardid, b.cardclass recordtype, b.driver, b.deposit, b.motorcadecode, b.motorcadename, b.validflag from B_CARD_T b where b.carno = #{carno,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and b.cardid!=#{cardid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select b.cardid from B_CARD_T b where b.validflag = 3 and b.cardclass = 1 and b.carno = #{carno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select t.recordtype from B_BLACKLIST_T t where (t.cardid=#{cardid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or t.cardid=#{carno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) and t.validflag>0

select t.operatype id, t.operaname text from M_OPERACONFIG_T t where t.validflag>0
and t.operatype in (${operatype})
and (t.operatype like '%'||#{searchText}||'%' or t.operaname like '%'||#{searchText}||'%')
and t.cartype =#{cartype}

select t.workpointcode id, t.workpointname text from B_WORKPOINT_T t where t.linkname = '库房' and t.validflag = 3
and (t.workpointcode like '%'||#{searchText}||'%' or t.workpointname like '%'||#{searchText}||'%')

select t.workpointname id, t.workpointname text from b_workpoint_t t where t.linkname = '门岗' and t.validflag = 3
and t.workpointname like '%'||#{searchText}||'%'

select t.workpointcode id, t.workpointname text from b_workpoint_t t where t.linkname = '门岗' and t.validflag = 3
and t.workpointname like '%'||#{searchText}||'%'

select t.displayname id,t.displayname text from s_user_t t left join s_roleuser_t s on t.id = s.userid where t.validflag = 1 and s.roleid = '203379'
and (t.username like '%'||#{searchText}||'%' or t.displayname like '%'||#{searchText}||'%')
select t.sequence, t.node from l_detail_t t where t.operatype = #{operatype,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by t.sequence
{call SP_NEXTVAL_P (#{name,mode=IN,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{nextval,mode=OUT,jdbcType=VARCHAR})}

select t.carno, t.matchid, t.icid, t.rfidid, t.gatename, to_char(t.createdate,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') as createdate, t.createoperaname creator, t.usermemo , t.eid, t.ictype, t.id, t.entrytype from l_entrylog_t t left join l_applicationbill_t l on t.id = l.id where entrytype = 1 and t.validflag > 0 and l.validflag > 0 and t.entrytype = 1 and l.matchid = #{matchid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select id , icid , rfidid, matchid , gatename , to_char(createdate,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')createdate, createoperaname creator , usermemo , eid from l_entrylog_t where entrytype = 2 and id=#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select t.matchid,t.operatype, l.planid, l.orderno, t.carno, t.unitname, l.materialname, l.sourcename, l.targetname, l.sourceplace, l.ship, decode(l.suttleapp,'',0,l.suttleapp)*0.001 as suttleapp, decode(l.snumber,'',0,l.snumber) as snumber, decode(l.grossb,'',0,l.grossb)*0.001 as grossb, decode(l.tareb,'',0,l.tareb)*0.001 as tareb, to_char(t.createdate,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')createdate, t.createoperaname as createman, l.itemid, t.routeid from L_APPLICATIONBILL_T t left join l_applicationbill_item_t l on t.matchid = l.matchid where t.validflag>0 and l.validflag>0 and t.matchid=#{matchid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by l.materialcode,l.itemid
select matchid from L_APPLICATIONBILL_ITEM_T t where t.validflag > 0 and t.saleitemid=#{saleitemid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and rownum=1
select matchid from L_APPLICATIONBILL_T t where t.validflag > 0 and t.id=#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and rownum=1
select matchid from L_APPLICATIONBILL_T t where t.validflag > 0 and t.id=(select t.eid from L_ENTRYLOG_T t where t.id=#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) and rownum=1

select carno, matchid, matchidb, operatype, planid, taskcode, materialcode, materialname, materialspeccode, materialspec, shipcode, ship, sourcecode, sourcename, sourceplace, sourcetime, targetcode, targetname, targetplace, targettime, materialcount, planweight, planmaterialcount, plancarcount, gross*0.001 gross, to_char(grosstime,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as grosstime, grossweighid, grossweigh, grossoperacode, grossoperaname, grossgroupno, grossserial, grossspeed, grosslogid, tare*0.001 tare, to_char(taretime,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as taretime, tareweighid, tareweigh, tareoperacode, tareoperaname, taregroupno, tareserial, tarelogid, tarespeed, deduction, to_char(deductiontime, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') as deductiontime, deductioncode, deductionname, deductionoperacode, deductionoperaname, suttle*0.001 suttle, to_char(suttletime, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') as suttletime, suttleweighid, suttleweigh, suttleoperaname, suttleoperacode, grossb*0.001 grossb, grosstimeb, grossweighidb, grossweighb, grossoperacodeb, grossoperanameb, grossgroupnob, grossserialb, grossspeedb, grosslogidb, tareb*0.001 tareb, taretimeb, tareweighidb, tareweighb, tareoperacodeb, tareoperanameb, taregroupnob, tareserialb, tarelogidb, tarespeedb, batchcode, bflag, usermemo, sysmemo, createdate, validflag, suttleb, printgrossnum, printsuttlenum, validflagtime, validflagoperaname, motorcadename, memo1, basket from m_measure_t where validflag > 0 and matchid = #{matchid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT distinct S.MATCHID, S.COUNTS AS SUTTLE, S.PLANID, II.IFILEPATH, A.SALEITEMID FROM M_OPERACONFIG_T O, L_STOREIN_ITEM_T S, L_STOREIN_T I, L_INTERFACEINFO_T II, L_APPLICATIONBILL_ITEM_T A WHERE O.OPERATYPE = I.OPERATYPE AND S.MATCHID = I.MATCHID AND S.MATCHID = A.MATCHID AND S.PLANID = II.PLANID AND A.ITEMID = S.ITEMID AND O.ISORMEASURE = 0 AND S.COUNTS > 0 and s.validflag > 0 and s.matchid = #{matchid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by s.matchid, s.planid

select t.id, t.carno, t.matchid, m.planid, m.materialname, m.sourcename, m.storename as targetname, t.storename, m.weight * 0.001 weight, e.suttle * 0.001 suttle, m.counts, t.createoperaname, to_char(t.createdate, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') storeintime, t.usermemo from l_storein_t t left join l_storein_item_t m on (t.matchid = m.matchid and m.validflag > 0) left join m_measure_t e on (e.matchid = t.matchid and e.validflag > 0) where t.validflag > 0 and t.matchid = #{matchid, jdbcType = VARCHAR}

select t.id, t.carno, t.matchid, m.planid, m.materialname, m.storename as sourcename, m.targetname, t.storename, m.weight * 0.001 weight, e.suttle * 0.001 suttle, m.counts, t.createoperaname, to_char(t.createdate, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') storeintime, t.usermemo from l_storeout_t t left join l_storeout_item_t m on (t.matchid = m.matchid and m.validflag > 0) left join m_measure_t e on (t.matchid = e.matchid and e.validflag > 0) where t.validflag > 0 and t.matchid = #{matchid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select t.id, t.carno, t.matchid, m.planid, m.materialname, m.sourcename, m.targetname, t.qmpostion, t.createoperaname creator, to_char(t.createdate,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') createdate , t.usermemo from q_quality_t t left join l_applicationbill_item_t m on t.matchid = m.matchid where t.validflag > 0 and t.matchid = #{matchid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by m.itemid

select t.customercode id, t.customername text from b_customer_v t where t.customertype = 1
and (t.customercode like '%' || #{searchText} ||'%' or t.customername like '%' ||#{searchText}||'%' )

select t.customercode id, t.customername text from b_customer_v t where t.customertype = 2
and (t.customercode like '%' || #{searchText} ||'%' or t.customername like '%' ||#{searchText}||'%' )

select t.storecode id , t.storename text from b_storename_v t where 1=1
and (t.storecode like '%' || #{searchText} || '%' or t.storename like '%' || #{searchText} || '%')

select t.materialcode id, t.materialname text from b_material_v t where 1=1
and (t.materialcode like '%' || #{searchText} || '%' or t.materialname like '%' || #{searchText} || '%')

select t.materialcode id, t.materialname text from b_material_base_v t where 1=1
and (t.materialcode like '%' || #{searchText} || '%' or t.materialname like '%' || #{searchText} || '%')

select t.materialcode , t.materialname from b_material_v t where 1=1
and t.materialcode like '%' || #{materialcode}||'%'
and t.materialname like '%' || #{materialname}||'%'

select t.stationname id, t.stationname text from b_sation_v t
where (t.queryword like '%' || #{searchText} || '%' or t.stationname like '%' || #{searchText} || '%')

select t.planid, t.carno, t.saleitemid, t.materialcode, t.materialname, t.sourcecode, t.sourcename, t.targetcode, t.targetname, t.documentcode, t.routeid, t.auditlevel, t.operatype, t.operaname, t.materialspec, t.measureunit, t.steelname, t.pictureno, t.prodline, t.usermemo, t.snumber, t.arrivetime, t.documentname from l_plan_v t where 1=1
and t.carno =trim(#{carno})
and t.materialname like #{materialname}||'%'
and t.targetname like #{targetname} ||'%'
and t.sourcename like #{sourcename}||'%'
order by t.planid,t.arrivetime desc
select t.id,t.opertype,t.logisticaltype,t.materialcode from P_MEASUREROLE_T t where t.logisticaltype not in ('T','G')
select d.id,d.pid,d.functionname,d.ctrlmemo from P_MEASUREROLE_DETAIL_T d
select t.auditlevel,t.materiallflow from B_DOCUMENTTYPE_T t where t.documentcode=#{documentcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and rownum=1 and t.validflag>0

select t.motorcadecode id, t.motorcadename text from B_TRANSPORT_T t where t.validflag > 0
and (t.motorcadecode like '%' || #{searchText} ||'%' or t.motorcadename like '%' ||#{searchText}||'%' )

select t.equcode id, t.equname text from M_EQUIPMENT_T t where t.equtype='C'
and (t.equcode like '%' || #{searchText} ||'%' or t.equname like '%' ||#{searchText}||'%' )

select t.id,t.worklinename text from l_workline_t t where t.validflag>0
and (t.id like '%' || #{searchText} ||'%' or t.worklinename like '%' ||#{searchText}||'%' )

select t.workpointcode as id,t.workpointname as text from b_workpoint_t t where t.validflag = 1
and (t.workpointcode like '%'||#{searchText}||'%' or t.workpointname like '%'||#{searchText}||'%' or queryword like '%'||#{searchText}||'%')

select t.storecode as id,t.storename as text from b_storename_t t where t.validflag >0 and t.types=3 and t.storename not in (select w.workpointname from b_workpoint_t w where w.validflag > 0)
and (t.storecode like '%'||#{searchText}||'%' or t.storename like '%'||#{searchText}||'%' or queryword like '%'||#{searchText}||'%')

select t.unitname as id,t.unitname as text from b_measureunit_v t where 1= 1
and t.unitname like '%'||#{searchText}||'%'
select count(1) from b_blacklist_t t where t.cardid=#{carno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}and t.validflag>0

select id, matchid, carno, createman creator, createdate cdate, usermemo, stoplink, linkcode, linkname, materialname, sourcename, targetname from l_forcestop_log_t
and t.matchid like '%' ||#{matchid}||'%' )
and t.carno like '%' ||#{carno}||'%' )
and t.stoplink like '%' ||#{stoplink}||'%' )
mapper.insert: insert into l_forcestop_log_t (id, matchid, carno, createman, createdate, usermemo, stoplink, linkcode, linkname, materialname, sourcename, targetname) values (l_forcestop_log_s.nextval, #{matchid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate, #{usermemo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stoplink,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unitcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unitname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{materialname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sourcename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{targetname,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select t.carno, t.matchid, t.materialname, t.sourcename, t.targetname from L_CURR_TEMP_T t where t.matchid=#{matchid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and rownum=1
mapper.update: update l_curr_temp_t set validflag=9 where matchid=#{matchid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
update l_curr_temp_t set validflag=1 where matchid=#{matchid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select briefname, validflag, orderindex, queryword, createdate, createman, updatedate, updateman, validman, validtime, sysmemo from b_carhead_t where validflag =1 order by orderindex asc
select ictype, rfidtype from b_workpoint_t b where validflag> 0 and workpointcode = #{workpointcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and rownum = 1
select t.carno from l_plan_v t where t.carno like '%'||#{carno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%' group by t.carno

select t.carno from (select b.carno from l_applicationbill_t b left join l_applicationbill_item_t c on (b.matchid = c.matchid and c.validflag > 0) left join l_curr_temp_t t on (b.matchid = t.matchid and t.validflag > 0) left join m_operaconfig_t m on b.operatype = m.operatype left join l_entrylog_t l on b.id = l.id where b.validflag = 1 and b.types = 0 and t.sflag != 1 and t.targettime is null and ((t.gross > 0 and m.isormeasure = 1) or m.isormeasure = 0) group by b.carno) t where t.carno like '%'||#{carno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%' group by t.carno

select t.carno from (select b.carno from l_applicationbill_t b left join l_applicationbill_item_t c on (b.matchid = c.matchid and c.validflag > 0) left join l_curr_temp_t t on (b.matchid = t.matchid and t.validflag > 0) left join m_operaconfig_t m on b.operatype = m.operatype left join l_entrylog_t l on b.id = l.id where b.validflag = 1 and b.types = 0 and t.sflag != 2 and t.sourcetime is null and ((t.tare > 0 and m.isormeasure = 1) or m.isormeasure = 0) group by b.carno) t where t.carno like '%'||#{carno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'

select t.taskcode, t.operatype, t.materialcode, t.materialname, t.sourcecode, t.sourcename, t.targetcode, t.targetname, t.mflag,t.tarehour , decode(mflag, '1', '先毛后皮', '2', '先皮后毛') measurement from b_taskcode_t t where t.validflag>0
and t.taskcode =#{taskcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and t.materialname like '%'|| #{materialname}||'%'
and t.targetname like '%'|| #{targetname} ||'%'
and t.sourcename like '%' || #{sourcename}||'%'

select t.matchid, t.itemid, f.saleitemid, a.carno, (select b.cardid from b_card_t b where b.carno=a.carno and b.cardclass=0 and b.validflag=3 and rownum=1)icid, f.materialid materialcode, l.mainid orderno, l.planid, l.sourceid sourcecode, a.routeid, to_char(e.createdate, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') begintime, a.operatype, f.reserve1, f.reserve2, f.reserve3, f.reserve4, f.reserve5, f.reserve6, f.reserve7, f.reserve8, f.reserve9, f.reserve10, l.reserve5 memo, l.reserve6 memo1, l.reserve7 memo2, l.reserve8 memo3, l.reserve9 memo4 from l_applicationbill_t a left join l_applicationbill_item_t t on a.matchid = t.matchid left join l_interfaceinfo_item_t f on t.saleitemid = f.saleitemid left join l_interfaceinfo_t l on f.fid = l.id left join l_entrylog_t e on a.id = e.id where t.matchid = #{matchid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and rownum=1
select t.workpointcode from l_workline_item_t t where t.fid = #{routeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.nodecode = 'SP'

select t.matchid, t.itemid, e.id, a.routeid, to_char(e.createdate, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') begintime, a.operatype from l_applicationbill_t a left join l_applicationbill_item_t t on a.matchid = t.matchid left join l_entrylog_t e on a.id = e.eid where t.matchid = #{matchid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and rownum=1
select GET_MATERIALPROPERTY_F(#{mateiralcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) from dual
mapper.insert: insert into L_AUTOUPLOAD_T (info, msg) values (#{text,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{searchText, jdbcType = VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select t.carno, t.icid, t.rfidid, t.matchid, t.planid, t.taskcode, t.materialname, t.materialspec, t.sourceplace, t.sourcename, t.targetname, t.targetplace, t.planweight, t.gross * 0.001 gross, t.grosstime, t.tare * 0.001 tare, t.taretime, t.suttle * 0.001 suttle, substr(t.suttletime, 0, 16) suttletime, t.deduction, t.grossb, t.tareb, decode(round(t.grossb - tareb, 2), '', 0, round(t.grossb - tareb, 2)) suttleb, t.bflag, t.usermemo || t.memo3 || t.memo4 usermemo, t.operatype, t.suttleweigh, t.mstate, t.routeid, t.sourcetime, t.targettime, t.sampletime, t.entertime from l_curr_temp_t t where t.matchid = #{matchid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.validflag = 1 order by t.matchid asc

select t.carno, t.icid, t.matchid, t.taskcode, t.materialname, t.materialcode, t.sourcecode, t.sourcename, t.targetname, t.targetcode, t.tare * 0.001 tare, t.taretime, t.tareweighid, t.tareweigh, t.tareoperacode, t.tareoperaname, t.operatype, t.tarehour, t.mflag from l_curr_temp_t t where t.operatype in('-1','0','10') and t.carno = #{carno,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.gross=0 and t.mstate=0 and t.validflag = 1

select t.carno, t.icid, t.tare * 0.001 tare, to_char(t.taretime,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') taretime, t.tareweighid, t.tareweigh, t.tareoperacode, t.tareoperaname, (sysdate-t.taretime) tarediff from m_tare_t t where t.carno = #{carno,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.validflag = 1
mapper.insert: insert into m_exception_log_t (matchid, usermemo, operaman, createdate, types) values (#{matchid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usermemo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate, 2)
mapper.select: select b.cardid, b.cardtype, b.cartype,b.driver,b.unitname from B_CARD_T b where b.validflag = 3 and b.cardclass = 0 and b.carno = #{carno,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and rownum = 1
select t.carno from b_card_t t where t.validflag = 3 and t.cardclass=0

select t.materialcode id, t.materialname text from b_material_hc_v t
where (t.materialcode like '%' || #{searchText} || '%' or t.materialname like '%' || #{searchText} || '%')

select t.customercode id, t.customername text from b_customer_hc_v t
where (t.customercode like '%' || #{searchText} ||'%' or t.customername like '%' ||#{searchText}||'%' )
select to_char(sysdate,'yyyy/MM/dd hh24:mi:ss') from dual
